name: nitsan/ns-news-advancedsearch
description: Do you want more rich search features into your favourite EXT:news? By installing this extension, you can search by category, title, teaser etc. Know  more in manual. Live-Demo: https://demo.t3terminal.com//t3t-extensions/news-advancedsearch You can download PRO version for more-features & free-support at https://t3terminal.com/advanced-search-typo3-news-extension
